name: collectible-card-game-daar
author: Guillaume Hivert <hivert.is.coming@gmail.com>

scripts.postinstall: yarn --cwd contracts install && yarn --cwd frontend install

description: Welcome to the DAAR project. The idea will be to implement a Collectible Card Game in a decentralized way, on Ethereum. This will force you to iterate through the creation of CCG cards as NFT, create a marketplace for players to exchange NFT, and run a frontend to create collections.
